specifications.Finish: Mechanical > Laminated A laminated fabric is a two (or more) layer construction with a polymer film bonded to a fabric. It provides water resistance and wind-proof properties, making it suitable for rainwear, automotive, and other applications.
specifications.Care Advice: Mechanical > Laminated The film portion is delicate, and may melt when ironed at high temperatures. Iron at low temperature and avoid direct ironing on the film.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash with similar colors Do not rub Do not bleach Line dry Do not tumble dry Do not iron Do not dry clean Performance Water Resistant Waterproof is a specially coated fabric that prevents water penetration to a certain degree, though it may not be completely impermeable. This treatment helps protect the wearer or the item from rain and moisture, making it suitable for outerwear, bags, and outdoor gear. Recommended Use Activewear, Raincoat
